document.full_text: a debate about makena, a costly drug to prevent premature birth, revolves around the struggle between manufacturers and the government over who is best equipped to safeguard the nation's drug supply.
document.title: news analysis: drugs' cost and safety fuel a fight
lines_and_colors: a debate about makena, a costly drug to prevent premature birth, revolves around the struggle between manufacturers and the government over who is best equipped to safeguard the nation's drug supply.
